# AbstractUIC

> Reusable UI packages for AbstractFramework clients (React components + a small Web Component).

AbstractUIC is a **multi-package repository**: each top-level folder is an independently-consumable npm package.

## Summary (source of truth)

- React packages ship **compiled ESM + type declarations** (built from `src/` into `dist/`; see `exports` in each `*/package.json`).
- CSS is shipped as **explicit package exports**; import it from your app entrypoint (see `docs/getting-started.md`).
- Primary docs entrypoints: `README.md` → `docs/getting-started.md` → `docs/api.md`.

## Quick commands

- Install workspace deps: `npm install`
- Build packages: `npm run build`
- Run tests: `npm test` (only `@abstractframework/monitor-gpu` currently ships automated tests)
- Regenerate `llms-full.txt`: `python scripts/generate-llms-full.py`

Key packages:
- `@abstractframework/ui-kit`: theme tokens + small UI primitives (selects/icons)
- `@abstractframework/panel-chat`: chat thread/message UI + markdown/json renderers
- `@abstractframework/monitor-flow`: agent-cycle trace viewer + ledger adapter
- `@abstractframework/monitor-active-memory`: KG + Active Memory explorer (ReactFlow)
- `@abstractframework/monitor-gpu`: GPU histogram widget (`<monitor-gpu>`) polling a metrics endpoint

## Documentation

- [README](README.md): Overview, packages, and quick links
- [Getting started](docs/getting-started.md): Pick packages, install/integrate, required CSS, quick examples
- [API reference](docs/api.md): Export map per package (plus CSS entrypoints)
- [FAQ](docs/faq.md): Common integration questions (bundling, CSS, SSR, per-package notes)
- [Architecture](docs/architecture.md): Package boundaries + diagrams
- [Docs index](docs/README.md): Full docs list
- [Contributing](CONTRIBUTING.md): Dev workflow, docs expectations, and checks
- [Security policy](SECURITY.md): Responsible vulnerability reporting
- [Changelog](CHANGELOG.md): Notable changes by version
- [Acknowledgments](ACKNOWLEDMENTS.md): Credits and thanks

## Packages

- [@abstractframework/ui-kit](ui-kit/README.md): Theme tokens and UI primitives
- [@abstractframework/panel-chat](panel-chat/README.md): Chat primitives
- [@abstractframework/monitor-flow](monitor-flow/README.md): Agent cycle trace viewer
- [@abstractframework/monitor-active-memory](monitor-active-memory/README.md): KG/Active Memory explorer
- [@abstractframework/monitor-gpu](monitor-gpu/README.md): GPU widget

- [Publishing (maintainers)](docs/publishing.md): Release checklist and npm publish notes
